snippet.title: [PS2 Longplay] Transformers (2004, Atari) - Recruit Difficulty as Optimus Prime with 100% Completion
snippet.description:
Extremely casual gameplay with moments of not being an idiot sprinkled in every once in a while. And by that, I mean I'm actually good at this game but I'm also trying too hard to flex in some instances and I'm straight up bad at the Tidal Wave fight. Oh well. At least this was done without cheats and on real hardware unlike a certain other longplay out there. :^)



Footage recorded from a real PlayStation 2 using the Elgato Game Capture HD and the provided component cable. Captured at native resolution (480i @ 30fps, though the game uses some tricks to appear to be running at a higher frame rate), then Smart Upscaled (x4) and Sharpened (0.5x) in Sony Vegas.


Please credit me if you use this footage for your project!
